poem:
### Echoes in the Sky

In the quiet fields of Poland,  
a drone whispers its cold tale—  
crafted by distant hands,  
it rends the air with silent intent.  
Villagers pause, hearts anchored,   
as history's shadow stretches,  
binding skies with an iron thread,  
stitching world to world,  
peace to the looming specter  
of unbidden thunder.
